name: Everburning
description:
A dormant secret lay beneath the ruins of a forgotten world. A Goddess, unravelling from the rumbles of a temple, entrusts you with a mission: to build a female-only guild. Can you, noble warrior, fulfil her request? Put together your mysterious, clouded past, all while leading your guild to success!

  • Hire heroines and send them to accomplish missions from the bulletin board.
  • Build, build, build! New buildings will give you a lot of opportunities for the development and improvement of the Guild;
  • Meet your allies. Each girl has a unique story and personality. Some are harder to get than others, but your patience will surely be rewarded. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
  • Learn your own story. Your background is a mystery, by progressing and interacting with others you'll put the pieces back together to unravel the secrets.

Features:
  • Interactive sex scenes with Live2D animation;
  • 10+ charming girls;
  • 30+ exciting quests;
  • Character levelling system;
  • In-depth combat system;
  • Native game resolution 4k Ultra HD;
  • Ability to play with one hand. ( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)
